players.name: Travis Hunter
players.description: Elite two-way player who excels at both wide receiver and cornerback. Known for his exceptional athleticism and playmaking ability on both sides of the ball. 2024 First-team All-Pac-12 selection.

players.name: Abdul Carter
players.description: Explosive edge rusher with excellent length and athleticism. 2024 Second-team All-Big Ten selection. Known for his ability to disrupt plays in the backfield and set the edge against the run.

players.name: Mason Graham
players.description: Dominant interior defensive lineman with exceptional strength and technique. 2024 First-team All-Big Ten selection and key contributor to Michigan's national championship defense.

players.name: Ashton Jeanty
players.description: Dynamic running back with excellent vision and breakaway speed. 2024 First-team All-Mountain West selection. Known for his ability to contribute in both the running and passing game.

players.name: Cam Ward
players.description: Strong-armed quarterback with excellent mobility and decision-making. 2024 Second-team All-Pac-12 selection. Transferred to Miami after a successful stint at Washington State.

players.name: Will Johnson
players.description: Shutdown corner with ideal size and athleticism. 2024 First-team All-Big Ten selection and Rose Bowl Defensive MVP. Known for his ability to match up with opposing teams' top receivers.

players.name: Will Campbell
players.description: Prototype left tackle with excellent size and athleticism. 2024 First-team All-SEC selection. Known for his strong pass protection and physical run blocking.

players.name: Shedeur Sanders
players.description: Accurate passer with excellent pocket presence and leadership skills. 2024 First-team All-Pac-12 selection. Set Colorado's single-season passing record in 2024.

players.name: Mykel Williams
players.description: Versatile defensive lineman with excellent length and power. 2024 Second-team All-SEC selection. Known for his ability to play multiple positions along the defensive line.

players.name: Tyler Warren
players.description: Complete tight end with excellent size and athleticism. 2024 Second-team All-Big Ten selection. Known for his ability to contribute as both a receiver and blocker.
